title: Article 2 - STEEPLECHASES, HURDLE RACES AND HUNT MEETINGS
content:
Article 2 - STEEPLECHASES, HURDLE RACES AND HUNT MEETINGS
State Regulations

Part 4050 - General Provisions (§ 4050.1 to 4050.3)

Part 4051 - Regulations For Hunt Meetings (§ 4051.1 to 4051.4)

Part 4052 - Specifications For Courses (§ 4052.1 to 4052.5)

Part 4053 - Officials Of Meetings (§ 4053.1)

Part 4054 - Weights, Conditions And Distances (§ 4054.1 to 4054.14)

Part 4055 - Registration Of Race Horses (§ 4055.1 to 4055.5)

Part 4056 - Partnerships And Stable Names (§ 4056.1 to 4056.3)

Part 4057 - Estimated Winnings (§ 4057.1 to 4057.2)

Part 4058 - Penalties And Allowances (§ 4058.1 to 4058.3)

Part 4059 - Weighing Out (§ 4059.1 to 4059.3)

Part 4060 - Weighing In (§ 4060.1)

Part 4061 - Starting (§ 4061.1 to 4061.3)

Part 4062 - Walking Over (§ 4062.1)

Part 4063 - Claiming Races (§ 4063.1 to 4063.6)

Part 4064 - Amateur Riders (§ 4064.1 to 4064.11)

Part 4065 - Racing Colors (§ 4065.1)

Part 4066 - Rules For The Course (§ 4066.1 to 4066.6)

Part 4067 - Steeplechase Jockey Licensing Requirements (§ 4067.1 to 4067.6)

Part 4070 - Repealed

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
